sect1.title: About Torrent Search
sect1.para: &app; is an application for the Gnome Desktop Environment, allowing to search for torrent files on several websites, making it easier to the find the torrent you want.

We hope that as a user you will help us improve &app; even further by providing feedback. Both good and bad experiences / suggestions contribute equally well. If you are a developer and wish to help by coding, or a translator / documenter then your contributions on those fronts will also be welcomed gratefully.
Visit http://torrent-search.gwendallebihan.net/ for the latest news about &app;.
